attributes.action: Add an area on voting slips so that the voter can reject all candidates rather than not voting at all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One reason for poor voter turn out is that non of the candidates appeal. Rather than assume voter apathy, offer a 'vote none of these candidates' option.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
